In order to use Google Calendar with the: In order to use Google Calendar with the plugin, you have to activate and configure a Google Project.
Your authorization was revoked upstream,: Your authorization was revoked upstream, please disconnect and reconnect!
Something changed in your Google account: Something changed in your Google account (a password reset or similar), please disconnect and reconnect!
Google Calendar API is not configured.
Insufficient permissions for the Google: Insufficient permissions for the Google account %s, please disconnect it, then reconnect and ensure to select ALL the checkboxes when asked for permissions!
Event not created. The reservation is no: Event not created. The reservation is not confirmed.
Event not created. No destination calend: Event not created. No destination calendar is found.
This provider is already associated with: This provider is already associated with the Google Account %s
Allow service providers to connect their: Allow service providers to connect their own Google Account
If active, service providers will be abl: If active, service providers will be able to connect their own Google Account autonomously.
Allow service providers to use override: Allow service providers to use override commands.
If active, service providers will be abl: If active, service providers will be able to override some general service settings for specific slots, such as the price, by using slot commands directly in Google Calendar.
Google Cloud Platform console > OAuth Co: Google Cloud Platform console > OAuth Consent screen > Edit App (button) > App name
Copy/Paste this link in the Authorized J: Copy/Paste this link in the Authorized JS Origin field of the Google Project
Google Cloud Platform console > Credenti: Google Cloud Platform console > Credentials > Client ID
Google Cloud Platform console > Credentials > Client ID > Edit oAuth Client (pencil icon) > Client Secret
Copy/Paste this link in the Redirect URI: Copy/Paste this link in the Redirect URI field of the Google Project
If the value is greater than 0, the Goog: If the value is greater than 0, the Google Calendar availability events will be cached for the specified time (in seconds)
If the Google Calendar availability is n: If the Google Calendar availability is not changed too often, consider increasing this value to save Google API quota. However, note that events added to Google Calendar will only be detected by the plugin after this interval has passed.
Name: Name
You do not have the necessary authorizat: You do not have the necessary authorization to manage this availability plan at this time.
You do not have the necessary authorization to manage availability plans at this time.
A calendar cannot be both the source and: A calendar cannot be both the source and personal for the same plan.
Regenerate existing strings data for WPM: Regenerate existing strings data for WPML
Refer to the plugin documentation to kno: Refer to the plugin documentation to know hot to get your API keys.
The number of upcoming events that are d: The number of upcoming events that are displayed on the page
Shows a button to load more events: Shows a button to load more events
Limit the number of maximum events that: Limit the number of maximum events that can be loaded. 0 means no limit.
PayPal API are not configured, refunds a: PayPal API are not configured, refunds are not active.
Done in a currency not held by your PayP: Done in a currency not held by your PayPal account at the moment of the transaction.
Use of either Business or Premium PayPal: Use of either Business or Premium PayPal account is recommended to avoid issues, as you are not supposed to make commercial transactions with a Personal PayPal account.
Use this payment gateway to accept onlin: Use this payment gateway to accept online payments.
Payments will be addressed to this email: Payments will be addressed to this email.
If you are using the Sandbox for testing: If you are using the Sandbox for testing, ensure to put here an email address generated in the Sandbox instead of your live account, or the payment notifications will fail.
Payments will be checked against this em: Payments will be checked against this email. Use this setting if your PayPal account handles multiple email addresses and the payments are not supposed to go into the primary one.
Ensure that your primary PayPal email ad: Ensure that your primary PayPal email address is correct, otherwise payment notifications will fail.
Activate the sandbox to test payments.
After payment, the customer will be redi: After payment, the customer will be redirected to this URL.
Activate this setting to dump IPN reques: Activate this setting to dump IPN requests from PayPal in case of issues.
The customer email provided in the reser: The customer email provided in the reservation form will be used
Activate this option if you want to use: Activate this option if you want to use IDEAL
Deactivate this option only if another p: Deactivate this option only if another plugin is loading the same library
This is the URL where Stripe notifies th: This is the URL where Stripe notifies the payments. It must be equal to %s, otherwise go in your Stripe account dashboard and change the URL.
Please navigate in the preview to a page: Please navigate in the preview to a page where the booking calendar resides.
Frontend can be styled through the custo: Frontend can be styled through the customizer
Inside the customizer preview window, na: Inside the customizer preview window, navigate to a page where the booking calendar resides.
Export the plugin settings in a JSON fil: Export the plugin settings in a JSON file. It doesn't export data or user settings.
The exported file can't be imported on d: The exported file can't be imported on different versions of the plugin. This is meant to migrate settings from one environment to one another, not to pass settings through plugin versions which is not needed.
Import the plugin settings from a JSON f: Import the plugin settings from a JSON file. It doesn't import data or user settings.
Data such as services, reservations, pro: Data such as services, reservations, promotions and so on, requires an import/export of the following tables though a proper db migration plugin.
Migrates the data from old plugin versio: Migrates the data from old plugin version installed.
This will overwrite the current plugin d: This will overwrite the current plugin data.
Removes data of previous plugin versions: Removes data of previous plugin versions.
In case you migrated the data, please en: In case you migrated the data, please ensure that all is working as expected, before cleaning up 2.x data. This operation cannot be undone.
API tokens can be used by 3rd party appl: API tokens can be used by 3rd party applications to read/write the plugin data.
Don't generate tokens if you don't know: Don't generate tokens if you don't know what you're doing. Read the documentation to explore how the API endpoint works.
Give tokens only to someone you trust, a: Give tokens only to someone you trust, as they are able to read/write sensitive data.
Google requires the activation of a Goog: Google requires the activation of a Google Cloud billing account, in order to use Google Maps in your website.
This email address is already registered: This email address is already registered for a WordPress user.
This email address is already registered for another customer.
This WordPress User does not exist.
There are reservations for this customer: There are reservations for this customer.
Certain customers could not be removed d: Certain customers could not be removed due to existing reservations associated with them.
Please provide a valid email address.
This WordPress User is already associate: This WordPress User is already associated with another customer.
Another customer is already registered w: Another customer is already registered with this email address.
No timeslots found in the request: No timeslots found in the request
The requested service could not be found: The requested service could not be found for booking.
Multiple slot bookings are currently not: Multiple slot bookings are currently not permitted.
The current user is not eligible to book: The current user is not eligible to book this service.
Unable to find booking form submission.
Unable to find booking form data.
You have already reached the maximum num: You have already reached the maximum number of reservations for this service.
No available provider for this service.
Those time slots are not available anymo: Those time slots are not available anymore, apparently someone else was very fast :(
Trying to book more tickets than they're: Trying to book more tickets than they're available.
Trying to book more tickets than you're: Trying to book more tickets than you're allowed.
The current WordPress User is not linked: The current WordPress User is not linked to any customer.
Setting configuration has been delegated: Setting configuration has been delegated to service providers!
There are reservations for this service.
Some services were not removed because t: Some services were not removed because there were reservations in place for them.
If enabled, customers will be able to ex: If enabled, customers will be able to extend the reservation duration by selecting consecutive time slots.
Please refer to the documentation for mo: Please refer to the documentation for more information on the implications.
WP Roles allowed to manage the plugin: WP Roles allowed to manage the plugin
Select WP User roles that can manage the: Select WP User roles that can manage the plugin.
WP Roles allowed to be Service Providers: WP Roles allowed to be Service Providers
Select WP User roles that can provide se: Select WP User roles that can provide services.
Allow customers to download iCal file af: Allow customers to download iCal file after booking.
Enable Service Providers to manage their: Enable Service Providers to manage their own availability
Each service provider will have the abil: Each service provider will have the ability to create and manage their own availability plans for their services. Administrators can still oversee and fully manage those plans, if required.
When enabled, the currency code (e.g. US: When enabled, the currency code (e.g. USD) will be displayed throughout the UI instead of the currency symbol (e.g. $), ensuring clarity on the exact currency type.
The $ symbol here is taken as example, i: The $ symbol here is taken as example, it does not necessarily reflect the actual currency.
We're sorry, but at this time, your acco: We're sorry, but at this time, your account is restricted from making reservations. If you believe this is an error or need further assistance, please contact our support team.
When this setting is deactivated, the cu: When this setting is deactivated, the customer will be unable to make any reservations.
Number of months to query for events in: Number of months to query for events in a single API call.
Default is 1. Try to raise it if you hav: Default is 1. Try to raise it if you have sparse events and you want to speed up the loading times, or if you are hitting the limits of Google API usage quota too often.
Select the frontend page where customers: Select the frontend page where customers can view and manage their reservations.
To ensure functionality, the selected pa: To ensure functionality, the selected page must include the plugin widget in any section.
Select your preferred timezone for displ: Select your preferred timezone for displaying date and times in the frontend. By default, date and times are displayed in customer's local timezone.
If you don't already have a Google Maps: If you don't already have a Google Maps API key, please refer to the documentation for instructions on how to obtain one.
Load the calendar on the nearest date wi: Load the calendar on the nearest date with available slots
If enabled, the frontend calendar will l: If enabled, the frontend calendar will load on the nearest date that has at least one available slot.
Enabling this option may result in slowe: Enabling this option may result in slower page loading.
Use Google Places for address autocomple: Use Google Places for address autocomplete
Enable this setting if you want the Addr: Enable this setting if you want the Address field in the reservation form to be automatically completed using Google Places
Please note that this may have a signifi: Please note that this may have a significant impact on your Google Cloud usage billing.
When attempting to book a service for lo: When attempting to book a service for logged-in users only, customers will be prompted to log in at this page.
Leave it empty to use the WordPress defa: Leave it empty to use the WordPress default behaviour.
The customer must complete the online pa: The customer must complete the online payment within this specified time frame.
It is not recommended to set a very shor: It is not recommended to set a very short time as there could be delays in the acknowledgment of the payment by your web server for various reasons.
Controls if the booking form fields shou: Controls if the booking form fields should be pre-populated with available data for logged-in customers.
Each form field should be instructed whe: Each form field should be instructed where to fetch data through a proper meta-key configuration.
The decimal separator here is taken as e: The decimal separator here is taken as example, it does not necessarily reflect the actual separator.
The number of decimals here are taken as: The number of decimals here are taken as example, they does not necessarily reflect the actual number of decimals.
If set to \"fixed\", the coupon text wil: If set to "fixed", the coupon text will be the same as the promotion name. Alternatively, you can enter a list of single-use coupons, separated by commas. Please refer to the documentation for more information on coupon configuration.
Specify the maximum number of times the: Specify the maximum number of times the discount can be used globally across all reservations. Enter 0 for no limit.
Please enter the name of the promotion.
The promotion will be valid within the s: The promotion will be valid within the specified date range.
Select the services eligible for this pr: Select the services eligible for this promotion.
Maximum end date for time slots: Maximum end date for time slots
The promotion is valid for time slots th: The promotion is valid for time slots that end on or before this date.
The promotion will be applied conditiona: The promotion will be applied conditionally based on the time slot end date.
Minimum start date for time slots: Minimum start date for time slots
The promotion is valid for time slots th: The promotion is valid for time slots that start on or after this date.
The promotion will be applied conditiona: The promotion will be applied conditionally based on the time slot start date.
The discount will be applied to the base: The discount will be applied to the base price of the service.
Select the services to which this provid: Select the services to which this provider is restricted.
If you want to assign this service provi: If you want to assign this service provider to specific services, activate this setting.
Please note that if this setting is acti: Please note that if this setting is active, new services will not be automatically assigned to this provider.
When attempting to book a service for lo: When attempting to book a service for logged-in users only, customers will be prompted to register at this page.
Leave it empty to use the WordPress defa: Leave it empty to use the WordPress default behavior
Please provide the email address that wi: Please provide the email address that will be used as the sender of notifications from the system. If left empty or invalid, the admin email address of the WordPress website will be used instead.
Make sure that the email address you pro: Make sure that the email address you provide belongs to the domain of your mail server. Emails sent from unrecognized domains may be blocked by the recipient's email service.
If \"Logged user only\" is selected, a n: If "Logged user only" is selected, a notice with a link to the registration page will be displayed. The default link can be changed in the "Settings" section.
Allow customers to cancel a reservation: Allow customers to cancel a reservation
Customers will be able to cancel their r: Customers will be able to cancel their reservations for this service either by using the cancellation link in the email (if provided) or by visiting the page where a reservation status widget is placed (in which case they must be logged in).
By enabling this setting, reservations w: By enabling this setting, reservations won't be finalized immediately upon booking. Instead, they will await approval.
If enabled, no actions such as sending c: If enabled, no actions such as sending confirmation emails or updating Google Calendar will be performed until the reservation is approved.
In case of multiple service providers, y: In case of multiple service providers, you can specify the assignment rule that the plugin should follow after each reservation.
A new reservation will be assigned to th: A new reservation will be assigned to the service provider with the fewest number of reservations already assigned to them, based on the reservations stored in the database.
Always assign the reservation to a speci: Always assign the reservation to a specific service provider.
A random provider will be selected for t: A random provider will be selected for the assignment.
Even if a single reservation does not re: Even if a single reservation does not reach the maximum number of available tickets for the time slot(s), activating this setting will prevent other reservations from being made for the same time slot(s).
An email notification is sent to the adm: An email notification is sent to the admin after a booking is cancelled
An email notification is sent to the cus: An email notification is sent to the customer after a booking is cancelled
Specify the email address that should ap: Specify the email address that should appear as the sender.
The email address is taken from Settings: The email address is taken from Settings > General > Sender email. The sender name will be the site title as set in WordPress > General.
Email address and name as set in the Wor: Email address and name as set in the WordPress user profile of the service provider
Allow customers to provide a reason when: Allow customers to provide a reason when canceling a reservation.
Customers are not able to cancel their r: Customers are not able to cancel their reservations when the start date and time are within this specified timespan.
Select the color for the service.
You just got a new reservation!: You just got a new reservation!
An email notification will be sent to th: An email notification will be sent to the admin after a booking is made.
If the reservation form collects one or: If the reservation form collects one or more file from the customer, you can enable or disable the inclusion of those files as email attachments.
An email notification will be sent to th: An email notification will be sent to the customer after a booking is made.
Automatically create a Zoom Meeting afte: Automatically create a Zoom Meeting after a reservation is made.
It will be displayed at the top of the t: It will be displayed at the top of the time slots list or reservation form for unscheduled services.
If you use HTML content, please consider: If you use HTML content, please consider the fact that it will observe the stylesheet of your theme and other plugins, so the result may differ from what you see in the editor.
How to treat discarded available slots: How to treat discarded available slots
Choose how to handle available slots tha: Choose how to handle available slots that are discarded due to overlapping settings.
Choose how to set the location for this: Choose how to set the location for this service. If a location is provided, it will be displayed in the frontend with directions and a map, unless specified otherwise.
Inherited from the booking form Address: Inherited from the booking form Address field
Choose whether the location should be vi: Choose whether the location should be visible in the frontend. If you choose to hide the location from the frontend, it will still be visible in the backend and can be used, for example, in email templates.
The book button will display the number: The book button will display the number of reservations remaining for the current user. If the limit is reached, the user will not be able to proceed. Set 0 for no limit.
Choose the name of the service: Choose the name of the service
Customers are required to make an online: Customers are required to make an online payment. If no payment is made within the specified pending time, the reservation will be automatically cancelled.
The plugin will not handle the payment. You should manually set the reservation as "Paid" when the payment is done locally.
Customers can choose whether to pay onli: Customers can choose whether to pay online or pay later/locally.
Select how the buffer between time slots: Select how the buffer between time slots should be calculated
The buffer is calculated between both fr: The buffer is calculated between both free and booked slots within a container interval. This option is the default and ensures a consistent distribution of slots.
The buffer is applied around booked slot: The buffer is applied around booked slots. It can cause redistribution of free slots when a new reservation is made.
Get notified when a customer cancels a r: Get notified when a customer cancels a reservation for this service that was booked from you
Get notified when someone books this ser: Get notified when someone books this service from you
Block availability if overlaps with rese: Block availability if overlaps with reservations for other services
Activate this option to automatically bl: Activate this option to automatically block all other overlapping available slots as soon as one of them is booked.
Block availability if overlaps with pers: Block availability if overlaps with personal events
Busy events in a personal Google Calenda: Busy events in a personal Google Calendar will block the availability of this service. A personal Google Calendar which is different from the source one, must be set for this to work.
Block availability if overlaps with rese: Block availability if overlaps with reservations for the same service
When using multiple availability plans f: When using multiple availability plans for this service, enable this to exclude overlapping slots once a reservation is placed, regardless of which plan initiated it. Applicable only to non-independent plans.
Select a color for the Google Calendar r: Select a color for the Google Calendar reservation events.
Provide a title for the Google Calendar: Provide a title for the Google Calendar reservation events.
Choose how the slots should be redistrib: Choose how the slots should be redistributed when a blocking event or a reservation of other services occurs.
Slots will always observe the original s: Slots will always observe the original segmentation
Slots are adapted to maximize the availa: Slots are adapted to maximize the available times
Add customers as guests of the Google Ca: Add customers as guests of the Google Calendar event
If enabled, customers will receive Googl: If enabled, customers will receive Google notifications based on your Google Calendar settings. Additionally, a copy of the event will be created in their Google Calendars (if they have one), allowing them to view the event description. They will not have access to the guests list.
In accordance with personal data regulat: In accordance with personal data regulations, it may be necessary to provide customers with a comprehensive disclosure regarding the storage of their data. Additionally, you should ensure the ability to erase such data upon request. Before configuring this option to store customer personal data outside of this site, it is advisable to consult with the site administrator to ensure compliance with relevant regulations and guidelines.
If enabled, reservations will be automat: If enabled, reservations will be automatically added as events to the designated Google Calendar.
In order for this feature to work, you n: In order for this feature to work, you need to set a destination Google Calendar.
A Google Meet link will be created after: A Google Meet link will be created after a reservation is made.
Specify the content that should be inclu: Specify the content that should be included in the event description of the Google Calendar when a reservation is made.
Customer's name, tickets, email and phon: Customer's name, tickets, email and phone when available
Privacy alert: Please note that the cont: Privacy alert: Please note that the content of the Google Calendar event description may be visible to guests if customers are being added as guests.
Google Calendar event description custom: Google Calendar event description custom content
Set a Google Calendar reminder for reser: Set a Google Calendar reminder for reserved slot
Instead of dropping the slot, reservatio: Instead of dropping the slot, reservations made for the same service but in a different availability plan will be treated as if they are on the same plan.
Turn this off if you want to exclude you: Turn this off if you want to exclude your availability events from being counted for this service. This can be useful for temporary needs, such as vacations, as it allows you to maintain your availability schedule unchanged.
How the duration of a timeslot is define: How the duration of a timeslot is defined
Utilize the duration of the entire avail: Utilize the duration of the entire available interval as the slot duration for the service, without dividing it into separate timeslots.
Automatically divide the entire availabl: Automatically divide the entire available interval into timeslots of equal duration for the service.
Set the minimum required timespan betwee: Set the minimum required timespan between the current time and the time slot start or end time. Reservations are only allowed if the specified timespan is met, ensuring a buffer period for scheduling.
Specify the timespan before the start ti: Specify the timespan before the start time of a time slot when it becomes visible in the frontend for reservations. Slots will only be displayed if the start time is within the specified timespan.
Provide a picture for the service.
We hope you had a memorable experience.
Enable this feature to send a tailored e: Enable this feature to send a tailored email to customers after they've experienced the service.
Thank you for booking with us! We'll not: Thank you for booking with us! We'll notify you once your reservation is confirmed.
Upon making a booking that necessitates: Upon making a booking that necessitates approval, an email notification will be promptly dispatched to the customer.
If zero, won't appear. To change the cur: If zero, won't appear. To change the currency, navigate to the Settings section.
If active, the customer will be redirect: If active, the customer will be redirected to the specified URL after a successful reservation for this service. This is meant for tracking conversions.
About payments: when redirect is active,: About payments: when redirect is active, the immediate and later payment settings will work just fine, while discretion payment setting will not, so no payment option will be presented to the customer after the reservation in this case.
Reminders are sent using the WordPress C: Reminders are sent using the WordPress Cron system, which relies on site visits to trigger the scheduled events. If your site has low traffic, there may be delays or the reminders may not be sent at all.
Short text to describe the service: Short text to describe the service
By default, a location map is displayed. However, you can change this setting to hide the map if it is not needed.
When enabled, the provider name will be: When enabled, the provider name will be displayed as a hyperlink that leads to the provider's profile page. To set the profile page for each provider, navigate to WordPress > Users > Edit > Website.
Choose whether to display a list of the: Choose whether to display a list of the attendees or not, and which data it should include
Please carefully consider any privacy-re: Please carefully consider any privacy-related implications
The maximum number of tickets that a cus: The maximum number of tickets that a customer is allowed to book for a single slot. 0 means up to the maximum available tickets.
Choose the class of the service: Choose the class of the service
Activate this option if you want to keep: Activate this option if you want to keep the slot/tickets available for other reservations, until a reservation gets approved.
Activating this option could lead to ove: Activating this option could lead to overbooking
Service name + total number of available: Service name + total number of available slots
Service name + total number of available tickets
Select what the number inside the dots r: Select what the number inside the dots represents.
Numbers inside the dots are not displaye: Numbers inside the dots are not displayed when their value is below this threshold.
Do you want more styles or even create y: Do you want more styles or even create your own style? Just set this to "Default style", then install the SnazzyMaps WordPress plugin.
Enable this setting if you are experienc: Enable this setting if you are experiencing issues with the Google Maps JS library being loaded by another plugin or theme.
This determines the sorting order of ser: This determines the sorting order of service providers during the selection step.
This determines the sorting order of services during the selection step.
If enabled, the plugin will utilize the: If enabled, the plugin will utilize the existing caching system to improve loading times.
Disabling caching can significantly impa: Disabling caching can significantly impact the overall speed of the plugin. Only disable caching if you are encountering problems with your current caching system.
Enable this setting to allocate and mana: Enable this setting to allocate and manage services across multiple WordPress Users (service providers).
📢 We've rolled out some changes. Some of: 📢 We've rolled out some changes. Some of them might need your attention.
WP API nonce expired, please refresh the: WP API nonce expired, please refresh the page.
This panel is for administrative purpose: This panel is for administrative purposes only
Form conditionals and requirements will: Form conditionals and requirements will not be applied. All fields will be displayed, and all values will be allowed.
Reset this field if you want to create a: Reset this field if you want to create a new customer using the provided email address.
Please provide a valid email address: Please provide a valid email address
Customer notifications will follow this: Customer notifications will follow this timezone setting.
Associate the customer with a WordPress: Associate the customer with a WordPress user
If enabled, this API token restricts wri: If enabled, this API token restricts write operations for API requests.
Please enter the coupon text without any: Please enter the coupon text without any spaces
There are reservations for this customer: There are reservations for this customer
Deletion prevented: services are assigne: Deletion prevented: services are assigned to this location.
Please enter a valid and properly format: Please enter a valid and properly formatted address
Additional configuration options will be: Additional configuration options will be accessible once created.
This promotion is no longer available fo: This promotion is no longer available for customer use.
This promotion cannot be deleted because: This promotion cannot be deleted because there are reservations associated with it.
Please enter the promotion name without: Please enter the promotion name without any spaces
The promotion will run for the selected: The promotion will run for the selected period, the discount is automatically applied to any eligible service.
The promotion will run for the selected period, the discount is applied to any eligible service only if a valid coupon is provided.
I know what I'm doing, proceed: I know what I'm doing, proceed
Select additional properties to copy wit: Select additional properties to copy with service.
Deletion prevented: there are reservatio: Deletion prevented: there are reservations for this service.
Your changes here only affect the servic: Your changes here only affect the service when provided by you
A service with no scheduling needs. Thin: A service with no scheduling needs. Think about support tickets, estimate request, and so on.
Please provide a name for the service: Please provide a name for the service
Other fields are dependent on this field: Other fields are dependent on this field
Increase service price by the specified: Increase service price by the specified amount when this option is selected during booking
This placeholder, when inserted in a not: This placeholder, when inserted in a notification template, will be replaced with the value of the field. It must be unique in the context of the service.
The field will be pre-populated with the: The field will be pre-populated with the corresponding user meta when available (even if the field is hidden)
No valid fields in this form: No valid fields in this form
Parent field options must be 2 or more: Parent field options must be 2 or more
Apply dynamic rules to control the field: Apply dynamic rules to control the field's behavior based on the values of other fields.
The conditional rule feature is availabl: The conditional rule feature is available when the form includes at least one field of type number, options, or checkbox (excluding the current field).
Label: Label
The associated provider gains the abilit: The associated provider gains the ability to manage the Google Account integration.
Changing the service provider will unlin: Changing the service provider will unlink any calendars associated with this account from availability plans not assigned to the new provider
Events on this calendar will block plan: Events on this calendar will block plan availability
Events on this calendar will be consider: Events on this calendar will be considered as available time for this plan
Reservations made for this plan will gen: Reservations made for this plan will generate events on this calendar
This release represents our most signifi: This release represents our most significant update since the app's inception. Along with a host of new features and a complete visual revamp, it introduces pivotal changes you should be aware of. For a detailed overview, please consult our %supdated documentation%s.
Subject: Subject
List of single use coupon codes: List of single use coupon codes
Connect a Google Account and associate i: Connect a Google Account and associate it with the provider
The Google Account associated with this: The Google Account associated with this service provider grants access to their associated calendars, empowering them to effectively configure their Google integration using these calendars.
The service provider can autonomously li: The service provider can autonomously link their Google Account by navigating to Availability > Your Google Account.
Service provider notifications will foll: Service provider notifications will follow this timezone setting.
Get data for Zoom meeting ID %s: Get data for Zoom meeting ID %s
An event will be created or updated in a: An event will be created or updated in any destination calendar set for the availability plan for which this reservation was generated.
The discount values are based on the tim: The discount values are based on the time of the reservation and any subsequent changes to a promotion will not be reflected here.
Editing an expired reservation could lea: Editing an expired reservation could lead to overbooking as the spot may have been taken by other reservations.
I am aware of the potential risks: I am aware of the potential risks
You are editing the database directly: You are editing the database directly
Changes made here won't send notificatio: Changes made here won't send notifications. Use the actions in the reservations table to trigger them.
The service will be modified even if the: The service will be modified even if there are no available slots for it.
The date will be modified even if there: The date will be modified even if there are no available slots for it.
This is the latest service form availabl: This is the latest service form available.
If you've made changes to the service fo: If you've made changes to the service form after this reservation was submitted, some information may be missing or different from what the customer originally viewed.
Customer was not able to pay within the: Customer was not able to pay within the allowed time. Expired reservations are going to be automatically deleted on a weekly basis, unless the status is manually changed or the reservation is set as paid.
Please provide a name for the plan: Please provide a name for the plan
When set as independent, reservations fr: When set as independent, reservations from other plans will not interfere with the availability of this plan, and vice versa.
Services to which this availability sour: Services to which this availability source is applied.
Providers to which this availability sou: Providers to which this availability source is applied.
Changing the service provider will disas: Changing the service provider will disassociate any existing provider's Google Account. Please remember to reconfigure the Google Calendars for this plan, if necessary.
Calendars in which reservation events sh: Calendars in which reservation events should be created for this plan.
